      • setPosition

        public static CameraUpdate setPosition(LngLat lngLat)
        Create an update that moves the center of the camera view to a new LngLat
        Parameters:
        lngLat - The new center coordinates
        Returns:
        The update

      • setZoom

        public static CameraUpdate setZoom(float zoom)
        Create an update that moves the camera view to a new zoom level. Lower zoom values correspond to a higher effective altitude of the camera view.
        Parameters:
        zoom - The new zoom level
        Returns:
        The update

      • setRotation

        public static CameraUpdate setRotation(float radians)
        Create an update that sets the rotations of the camera view around the center point.
        Parameters:
        radians - The new rotation in radians counter-clockwise from North
        Returns:
        The update

      • setTilt

        public static CameraUpdate setTilt(float radians)
        Create an update that sets the tilt angle of the camera view.
        Parameters:
        radians - The new tilt angle in radians from straight down
        Returns:
        The update

      • rotateBy

        public static CameraUpdate rotateBy(float radians)
        Create an update that rotates the camera view around the center point by a relative amount.
        Parameters:
        radians - The change in rotation in radians counter-clockwise
        Returns:
        The update

      • tiltBy

        public static CameraUpdate tiltBy(float radians)
        Create an update that tilts the camera view by a relative amount.
        Parameters:
        radians - The change in tilt angle in radians
        Returns:
        The update

        public static CameraUpdate newLngLatZoom(LngLat lngLat,
                                         float zoom)
        Create an update that sets the center of the camera view and the zoom level.
        Parameters:
        lngLat - The coordinates of the new center
        zoom - The new zoom level
        Returns:
        The update

      • newLngLatBounds

        public static CameraUpdate newLngLatBounds(LngLat sw,
                                           LngLat ne,
                                           android.graphics.Rect padding)
        Create an update that sets the camera view to fit a rectangular area as closely as possible.
        Parameters:
        sw - The South-West corner of the area
        ne - The North-East corner of the area
        padding - Pixels of padding to leave around the area
        Returns:
        The update
